amendment.description: To prohibit the use of appropriated funds to pay the salaries or expenses of personnel to inspect horses under certain authority or guidelines.

action.text: Amendment SA 1753 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 1726.
Amendment SA 1753 was modified to reflect a first degree amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 1753 proposed by Senator Ensign.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1753 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 69 - 28. Record Vote Number: 237.
